item.title: Hugo
item.description: A hugo theme environment for stand-alone creative code experiments, reducing the learning curve so you can enjoy being in the zone. Download 1.4 Our goal to curate best practices (integrating, testing, documenting) to play with: processing p5js ml5js PWA (so it works well on mobile browsers) features CSS scope credits installation Shortcodes -- community Ready-to-use features to speed up your creative code: Want text not to be selectable?
